mapper.select: SELECT sr.sys_role_id, sr.role_name, sr.remark, sr.sort, sr.create_time, sr.update_time, sr.delete_time, sr.create_id, sr.update_id, sr.delete_id, sr.deleted, sr.city_permissions, sr.role_type, sr.data_range FROM sys_role sr INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_role_id = sr.sys_role_id WHERE sr.deleted = 0 AND sur.sys_user_id=#{sysUserId}
